title: Build a Family Attraction Pass
description: A family wants to buy a city pass that includes entry to the aquarium, the science museum, and a hop-on-hop-off bus tour.

tasks.description: Identify the desired attractions for the pass.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent lists the aquarium, science museum, and bus tour.

tasks.description: Check if a pre-existing package includes these attractions.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds a 'Family Fun Pass' that includes all three attractions.

tasks.description: Sell the 'Family Fun Pass' to the customer, explaining its benefits and how to use it at each attraction.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sells the pass and provides clear instructions.
